description: Cypress support file defining custom commands for UI testing, including device interaction flows, modal handling, notifications, and cleanup helpers.

methods.name: openAddDeviceModal
methods.description: Triggers UI to open the modal dialog for adding a device.

methods.name: fillDeviceForm
methods.description: Fills out the device form with provided device data.

methods.name: submitDeviceForm
methods.description: Submits the device form to save the device.

methods.name: confirmDeletion
methods.description: Confirms deletion in delete confirmation modal.

methods.name: expectNotification
methods.description: Checks for the presence of a notification with specific message.

methods.name: findDeviceRowByName
methods.description: Finds a table row element corresponding to a device name.

methods.name: apiDeleteByIP
methods.description: Deletes a device via API call, identified by IP address.
